\section{PROJECTS}Image Recognition
		\begin{itemize} \itemsep -2pt
		\item Given jpg images of handwritten numbers, designed an algorithm to analyze each pixel and decipher which number was written.
		\item Implemented in Python.
		\end{itemize}
		Spam Filter
		\begin{itemize} \itemsep -2pt
		\item Created an algorithm to classify emails as spam or not spam for an email service.
		\item Implemented in Python
		\end{itemize}
		Image Compression
		\begin{itemize} \itemsep -2pt
		\item Designed an algorithm to decrease the file size of any image based on a percentage inputed by the user.
		\item Implemented in Matlab.
		\end{itemize}
		PageRank
		\begin{itemize} \itemsep -2pt
		\item Designed ranking system using a version of the PageRank algorithm that ranked actors using IMDb ratings.
		\item Used the Beautiful Soup Python package to crawl through the HTML source code of imdb, recording the ratings of movies which had our selected actors listed.
		\item Each actors total score was averaged taking into account each movie's popularity and the number of reviews to ensure accuracy.
		\end{itemize}

\section{TECHNICAL \\ SKILLS} {\sl Languages \& Software:} Python, Java, Matlab/Octave,

                {\sl Operating Systems:} Windows, Mac, Unix\\
